short_summary: HVAC ventilation and duct work construction service. Installation and maintenance of heating, ventilation, and cooling (HVAC) systems.
description: Construction services for renovation of HVAC ventilation and duct work. Installation and maintenance of heating, ventilation, and cooling (HVAC) HVAC- Ventilation- Ventilation and ductwork Construction service
duration_in_months: For 10 to 14.5 months from January, 2024 to April to August 31, 2024.
full_summary:
=================

---------------------------

### Tender Information

#### Contact Information

#### Notice Information

*   **Notice URL**: [Discovery Ariba Link](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15836304?extsite=MTU4MzYzMDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Description

This notice solicits tender for CARE HVAC Systems Renovations – Phase 1. This document cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation under RFx No. Doc3772215201 dated November 30, 2022. Bidders are required to submit their bids by 14:00 (EDT) on 18 April 2023. All submissions made after this time will be deemed non-responsive. Please note that there is no security clearance required for this tender.  For forms, documentation required, submission instruction,
